System.name: A Fistful of Darkness
System.description: A game about gunslinging and impending doom in a weird west setting.

Playbooks.fistDescription: Like a cobra ready to strike
Playbooks.thunderheartDescription: A totem fighter born from the land
Playbooks.speaker: The Speaker
Playbooks.gentle-touchDescription: An empathic light in a dark world

Modules.itemsASetOfWonValuableDocuments: A Set of Won Valuable Documents
Modules.itemsFineAndVeryStrongCoughSyrup: Fine and Very Strong Cough Syrup
Modules.contactsArthurFog: Arthur Fog, a fake native or showman
Modules.contactsRalphBadEggHorn: Ralph 'Bad Egg' Horn, a gun smith
Modules.contactsHunter: Hunter, a spirit of the land
Modules.contactsHeWhoTalks: He Who Talks, a free spirit
Modules.contactsAFriend: a Friend you still owe money
Modules.contactsJohnPLittle: John P. Little, a cattle baron
Modules.contactsOldManBruford: Old Man Bruford, gin mill owner
Modules.specialAbilitiesIsThatAllYouGotDescripti: You may expend your special armor to avoid harm from an attack in combat, or to push yourself during a fight.
Modules.specialAbilitiesEverybodysKungFuFighting: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of body control or physical force that verges on the superhuman — engage a small gang on equal footing in close combat.
Modules.specialAbilitiesWhereDoesThatComeFromDes: Once per run, you may have a 1 load item left regardless of previously used load. If you can use the surprise to your advantage, gain the initiative even vs. experts.
Modules.specialAbilitiesStAngerDescription: When you open your body and soul to the Burning Beyond, you may imbue your hands, melee weapons, or tools with spirit energy. You gain Potency in combat vs. the supernatural. You may grapple with spirits to restrain and capture them.
Modules.specialAbilitiesHealthIsBetterThanWealth: You recover from harm faster. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. Take +1d to healing treatment rolls.
Modules.specialAbilitiesManOfHonorDescription: You gain an additional XP trigger: You fought for your, or someone else’s honor at cost to yourself. If your Posse has problems due to this, also mark Posse XP.
Modules.specialAbilitiesBadAssKataDescription: Describe how you show off and impress with your physical abilities. If you can exploit this performance for your next move, take improved position or +1 effect (your choice).
Modules.specialAbilitiesVeteranPosseDescription: Choose a special ability from another crew.
Modules.specialAbilitiesVeteranCharacterDescript: Choose a special ability from another source.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSmokeMirrorsDescription: You may expend your special armor to resist harm from combat, or appearing to die (fall off a vehicle, disappear in an explosion, etc.). only to reappear in a location of your choosing with a +1d to your next Action.
Modules.specialAbilitiesFancyDeadEyeDescription: You can push yourself to do one of the following: make a ranged attack at extreme distance — perform an impossible shot (ricochet around the corner, trick shots, shot into/through a group of people) — have one last bullet no one counted for.
Modules.specialAbilitiesEastwoodDescription: Before weapons are drawn, you may lock eyes with someone, forcing them to hesitate or flinch. Both of you know, that you can interrupt whatever they do next. Take +1d for your next Action against them.
Modules.specialAbilitiesLightningNervesOfSteelDe: You may always shoot first. You may wait ’til the latest possible moment and still be the first to (re-)act.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSilverBulletsDescription: You may enrich your shots with spirit energy. Your shots gain Potency in combat vs. the supernatural.
Modules.specialAbilitiesFillTheAirWithLeadDescri: Expend your Special Ammunition to do one of the following: unleash a barrage of rapid fire to suppress the enemy — attack a group with +1 scale.
Modules.specialAbilitiesStunningPerformanceDescr: You can perform a flashy show with your weapons or horse, that leaves your audience stunned and speechless. Take +1 effect, to act on this impressed folks or on escape.
Modules.specialAbilitiesIAmTheLawDescription: You may expend your special armor to show your badge of authority to enforce obedience, or to push yourself during a fight.
Modules.specialAbilitiesAStoryToTellDescription: Once per run you can push yourself to tell a story about a dire mess you survived to achieve one of the following: motivate a cohort/mob into fighting or fleeing — give a fighting cohort +1 effect restore 1 Grit for everybody in the Posse.
Modules.specialAbilitiesThisAintNoPique-niqueDes: When you Command a cohort in combat, they continue to fight when they would otherwise break (they’re not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain +1 effect and 1 armor.
Modules.specialAbilitiesWhatYourCountryCanDoForY: What Your Country Can Do for You
You have access to law enforcement resources. Get +1d when you acquire assets during Downtime. All assets have a minimum quality of 1.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSonlyAFleshWoundDescript: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal). When you accept level 2 or 3 harm instead of resisting, clear 1 Grit.
Modules.specialAbilitiesMoralCompassDescription: You gain an additional XP trigger: You did the right thing at cost to yourself. If your Posse has problems due to this, also mark Posse XP.
Modules.specialAbilitiesTacticalGeniusDescriptio: You always know the best position during a fight or hunt. If you’re able to occupy this position gain +1 Effect for you and everybody who’s there with you.
Modules.specialAbilitiesAllEyesOnMeDescription: You may expend your special armor to resist an allied characters consequence from detection, or to push yourself to impress others. You can always make a grand entrance.
Modules.specialAbilitiesGamblersGiftDescription: When someone fools you or takes you by surprise, gain a free 1 Grit flashback. When you gather information while partying or gambling, gain +1 Effect.
Modules.specialAbilitiesCuttingCardsDescription: Your skill with cards is mesmerizing. While you perform a card trick, you may alter a memory, implant a suggestion, or sow a doubt. You may use your playing cards as dangerous throwing weapons.
Modules.specialAbilitiesHeartOfTheCardsDescripti: When you accept Position and Effect given by the GM for a roll as is and just let the dice decide, don’t spend any Grit, or push the situation (you can still accept a Devil’s Bargain), regain 1 Grit.
Modules.specialAbilitiesFightWithPanacheDescript: When you fight in a duel, bystanders won’t interfere. If you use Sling while being in close combat, gain +1 Effect.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSaloonSwaggerDescription: Gain +1d in situations where your appearance would be an advantage. If you try to sway someone with a profitable proposition or challenge others to a duel, gain Potency.
Modules.specialAbilitiesMissFortuneDescription: Some call you lucky but truth be told, bad shit just happens to folk, who try to mess with you. You may win every game of chance. Spend 1 Grit to cause a minor accident (a jammed gun), 2 for a major one (an exploding stick of dynamite) or 3 for a catastrophe (a collapsing mine shaft). During Payout, gain +Doom equal to the highest amount of Grit spent this way.
Modules.specialAbilitiesDarkerThanTheShadowsDesc: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from detection, or to push yourself for a feat of hunting or stealth.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSilentHunterDescription: When you gather info to locate a target, you get +1 effect. When you hide in a prepared position or use camouflage, you get +1d to rolls to avoid detection.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSurvivorDescription: From hard won experience or specialized training, you are able to subsist on what any environment provides and you can function on the barest sustenance. You get +1 Grit box.
Modules.specialAbilitiesLearnedMyTradeFromTheBes: Learned My Trade from The Best
When you attack from hiding or spring a trap, you get +1d.
Modules.specialAbilitiesYoureMyGameDescription: You can smell their blood. When you hunt a target you’ve previously tracked or wounded, you gain +1 effect level. Whenever you gather information on a weakness or vulnerability, you get at least standard effect.
Modules.specialAbilitiesLikeABrotherDescription: Explain how your mount is helpful in what you’re trying to achieve and gain +1 effect level or +1d. Your mount always knows the way home.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSeeAnotherDayDescription: You gain an additional XP trigger: You let your prey escape because it was worthy to see another day. If your Posse has problems due to this, also mark Posse XP.
Modules.specialAbilitiesListenToTheLandDescripti: Outside of civilization you always know where you are and how to care for yourself and your mount. You always Read the weather with a Great effect.
Modules.specialAbilitiesOneOfThoseDaysDescriptio: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from a desperate roll, or to escape from whatever (or to wherever) you want... for now.
Modules.specialAbilitiesNowNowNowDescription: When you push yourself, you may spend +1 Grit (so 3 Grit total) to gain both +1 effect and +1d instead of one or the other.
Modules.specialAbilitiesDidntSeeThatComingDescri: When you make a surprising move that disregards propriety or other convention, you get +1d or +1 effect (your choice, as appropriate).
Modules.specialAbilitiesDaredevilDescription: When you roll a desperate action, you get +1d to your roll if you also take -1d to any resistance rolls against consequences from your action.
Modules.specialAbilitiesVengefulDescription: You gain an additional XP trigger: You got payback against someone who harmed you or someone you care about. If your Posse helped you get payback, also mark Posse XP.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSomeFineReputationDescri: Entering a location you may tell us what the people have heard about you. When you reveal your name and exploit your reputation you gain improved position or +1 effect (whatever makes sense).
Modules.specialAbilitiesBlazeOfGloryDescription: When you mark a Stigma and utter a dying malediction you may retaliate against any and all enemies within range. Say how you bring ruin to your foes before they take you down. You may mark a Stigma prematurely to use this ability.
Modules.specialAbilitiesGuidedByTheTotemDescript: You may expend your special armor to resist a supernatural consequence, or to push yourself for a feat of athletics or hunt.
Modules.specialAbilitiesTotemsVesselDescription: When you push yourself and open body and soul as a conduit for your totem, choose one of the following additional benefits: perform a feat of athletics or stealth that verges on the superhuman - maneuver to confuse your enemies so they mistakenly attack each other - sense your prey (gather Information with at least Standard result) wherever it is.
Modules.specialAbilitiesProtectorOfThePeopleDesc: When you protect a teammate or your people, take +1d to your resistance roll. When you gather info to anticipate possible threats in the current situation, you get +1 effect.
Modules.specialAbilitiesADevilWithABladeDescript: You’re very effective at finding vital organs with your blade. When using Sling, to throw or fight with a blade, you gain Potency and may choose to do it absolutely silently. On a miss you don’t get any positive result.
Modules.specialAbilitiesGruesomeWarpaintDescript: Enemies falter, hesitate, or flinch when attacked by you in close combat. You have an air of menace and danger obvious to even the most oblivious. You gain Potency when trying to intimidate someone. If done immediately after a show of force, also take +1d.
Modules.specialAbilitiesTotemSenseDescription: Pick an animal sense matching to your totem. This sense is sharpened beyond human range to animal sensitivity.
Modules.specialAbilitiesLoneWolfDescription: You gain an additional XP trigger: You made things harder by acting alone. If your Posse has problems due to this, also mark Posse XP.
Modules.specialAbilitiesWalkThroughTheValleyDesc: You may expend your special armor to resist a supernatural consequence, or to push yourself when dealing with Hell’s forces.
Modules.specialAbilitiesShepherdDescription: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of social grace, swaying a crowd, or capturing the attention of the Divine.
Modules.specialAbilitiesADogsNoseDescription: You always sense the tainted. Take +1d when you gather info to uncover corruption or find the corrupted.
Modules.specialAbilitiesHallowDescription: You can push yourself to imbue an object or a place with divine power. Gain Potency when it comes up against the supernatural.
Modules.specialAbilitiesCuranderoDescription: When you receive an earnest oath from someone to follow one of your Faith’s precepts, they may clear any level of severity of harm, immediately or safely over a short while, you decide. Should they ever break the precept, they take level 2 harm, ’Bedamned’.
Modules.specialAbilitiesEliDescription: One of your senses is so attuned to the world around you, that it can stand in for any one of your others. Get +1d to any Action you can mount as a surprise of this unexpected ability or where others are found lacking.
Modules.specialAbilitiesPremonitionDescription: Have one flashback per session to a vision, dream, prayer, or meditation that now comes together and has prepared you for this very moment. The first Grit spent this way is free.
Modules.specialAbilitiesGodSaveMeFromFriendsDesc: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence for a teammate, or to push yourself when you gather information or work on a Long-term Project. When you use it to resist you don’t have to be present to use this ability, say how you prepared for this situation in the past.
Modules.specialAbilitiesForesightDescription: Twice per Run you can assist a teammate without paying Grit. When you run out of Grit, instead of suffering a Stigma you may choose to come back with 1 Grit left. Either way tell us how you prepared for this.
Modules.specialAbilitiesPlanningIsEverythingDesc: Due to your careful planning, during Downtime, you may give yourself or another Posse member +1 Downtime Action.
Modules.specialAbilitiesRunsInTheFamilyDescripti: During Downtime, you get +1 result level when you acquire an asset or reduce Doom. You may choose ’distant cousin’ as an asset arriving by train.
Modules.specialAbilitiesWeavingTheWebDescription: ’By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.’ You gain +1d to Consort when you gather information on a target for a run. You get +1d to the engagement roll for that operation. When the engagement roll is 6, gain 1 Grit.
Modules.specialAbilitiesOldFriendsEverywhereDesc: When you come to a new town or settlement, name a Friend, Connection, Vice Purveyor, or Enemy you have here. Tell us a story about how you met and about your relationship.
Modules.specialAbilitiesFingersInEveryPieDescrip: At the end of each Downtime phase, you earn +2 Ablass.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSnakeOilMiraclesDescript: When you assist, or engage in a group Action with someone, they may also ignore one harm penalty.
Modules.specialAbilitiesInfluentialDescription: You provide a valuable service to the town and are welcome even in dangerous places. Get +1 result level when you speak on behalf of a local community, acquire an asset, or reduce Doom.
Modules.specialAbilitiesLittleVulturesDescriptio: Cohorts you command gain Potency to gather information and have special armor to resist a consequence of detection or deception.
Modules.specialAbilitiesWellTravelledDescription: You speak a multitude of languages and are broadly educated. When you gather information in a weird or foreign place, take +1d to your roll.
Modules.specialAbilitiesFandangoDescription: When you indulge your Vice, you may adjust the dice outcome by 1 or 2 (up or down). An ally who joins your Vice may do the same.
Modules.specialAbilitiesQuickWittedDescription: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of persuasion or suspicion. When you resist with Wit, take +1d.
Modules.specialAbilitiesViperDescription: When you invent, craft, or try to apply a poison or narcotic, take +1d to your roll. You begin the game with one additional formula already known.
Modules.specialAbilitiesInGoodHandsDescription: When you provide meaningful insight or heartfelt advice (to another PC), you both gain 1 Grit. Everyone in your Posse gets +1d to their healing treatment rolls.
Modules.specialAbilitiesDrivenDescription: During Downtime, you get 2 ticks to distribute among any Long-term Project clocks that involve investigation, or learning a new formula or design plan. Using Read, push yourself for 1 Grit instead of 2.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSkillfulDescription: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from breaking machines or experimenting with Hellstone, or to push yourself when working on weird science or handling Hellstone.
Modules.specialAbilitiesMadScientistDescription: When you invent or craft a creation with steam-craft or Hellstone features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special design already known.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSpiritmancerDescription: When you invent or craft a creation with arcane, spiritual, or demonic features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special formula already known.
Modules.specialAbilitiesListeningToTheirVoicesDe: When you touch them you may consort with machines to gather information with +1 result level. After that, you may push yourself to give it a feature or task it was not constructed for.
Modules.specialAbilitiesSpeakingTheirTongueDescr: You may attune yourself to any machine in sight to activate or disable it.
Modules.specialAbilitiesBloodSweatAndGearsDescri: You gain an additional XP trigger: If you achieved a breakthrough on a meaningful invention or scientific problem, mark XP. If your project caused trouble for your Posse, also mark Posse XP.
Modules.specialAbilitiesRightTimeRightToolDescri: You may use one of your items for a purpose of which it was not designed for. Fine items stay fine. Describe how you do it and how this is helpful.
Modules.specialAbilitiesHeighHoDescription: Each PC may add +1 Action rating to Attune, Disable, or Prowl (up to a max rating of 3).
Modules.specialAbilitiesTransporterDescription: When you execute a Travel Plan to start your run or Hellstone Scavenge, take +1d to the engagement roll.
Modules.specialAbilitiesDigDugDescription: No way to rip you off. When you acquire mining equipment or explosives, you get +1 result level to your roll.
Modules.specialAbilitiesLeverageDescription: Your Posse supplies ’found stuff’ for other Factions. Your success is good for them. Whenever you gain Rep, gain +1 Rep. Which Factions? Who’s angry about this arrangement? Which quality rating of which location is affected by this arrangement?
Modules.specialAbilitiesGotUsedToTheStrangeLife: Got Used to the Strange Life
Modules.specialAbilitiesGotUsedToTheStrangeLifeD: You get +1d to resistance rolls against supernatural threats including Delving Too Deep. You get +1d to healing rolls when you have supernatural harm.
Modules.specialAbilitiesUndueHellishConfidenceDe: No one can beat your Posse as long you have Hellstone around (at least it feels this way). Once per run you may regain 1 Grit if you make a Mutation Roll.
Modules.specialAbilitiesPatronDescription: When you advance your Tier, it costs half the coin it normally would. Who is your patron? Why do they help you?
Modules.specialAbilitiesDeadlySeriousDescription: Each PC may add +1 Action rating to Command, Sling, or Brawl (up to a max rating of 3).
Modules.specialAbilitiesBloodBrothersDescription: When you fight alongside your cohorts in combat, they get +1d for teamwork rolls (setup and group Actions). All of your cohorts get the Thugs type for free (if they’re already Thugs, add another type).
Modules.specialAbilitiesStraightforwardDescripti: When you execute an assault Plan, take +1d to the Engagement roll.
Modules.specialAbilitiesFiendsDescription: Fear is as good as respect. You may count each active Rider as if it was a claim.
Modules.specialAbilitiesForgedInTheFireDescripti: Each PC has been toughened by cruel experience. You get +1d to resistance rolls.
Modules.specialAbilitiesWarDogsDescription: When you’re in a feud (-3 Faction status), your Posse does not suffer -1 hold and PCs still get two Downtime activities, instead of just one.
Modules.specialAbilitiesBloodhoundsDescription: Each PC may add +1 Action rating to Command, Sling, or Hunt (up to a max rating of 3).
Modules.specialAbilitiesAWalkingRoguesGalleryDes: When your Posse has the chance to mull it over you will recognize any outlaw / lawman you’ve seen either in person or in a likeness. You know if there is a bounty on their head and its value.
Modules.specialAbilitiesLifeLineDescription: You bring ‘em in alive. You may choose that your target is only incapacitated instead of dead. There’s always a little bit of life left in them.
Modules.specialAbilitiesAnEyeForItDescription: You may Read artifacts or Hellstone weapons to find out what they do and how they are dangerous. With that you always get good details.
Modules.specialAbilitiesReallyUsefulDescription: Sometimes friends are as good as territory. You may count up to three +3 Faction statuses you hold as if they are claims.
Modules.specialAbilitiesLuckyFellowsDescription: When you roll Rider Events, roll twice and keep the one you want. When you reduce Doom on the Posse, take +1d.
Modules.specialAbilitiesWatchersDescription: Each PC may add +1 Action rating to Attune, Hunt, or Survey (up to a max rating of 3).
Modules.specialAbilitiesIntoTheBurningBeyondDesc: The spirits showed you the shifting paths into the Burning Beyond and back. You may attune to visit places of the Beyond, if you respect the inhabitants, and bring appropriate offerings. You don’t have to leave the way you came.
Modules.specialAbilitiesHorsebackIsHomeDescripti: You get +1d while on horseback. You speak the language of horses. You may ask them to gather information with +1 effect. You lose 3 Grit when your horse dies.
Modules.specialAbilitiesOneWithTheLandDescriptio: You may command the spirits of the land or ask kindly for their help or advice. You may ignore one consequence if the spirits chose to provide cover. Or you may gain +1d if they chose to help you on your path.
Modules.specialAbilitiesOneWithThePeopleDescript: When you have a Downtime in your people’s territory, your tribe has one additional Downtime Action, and gains +1d to Acquire Asset. Describe how this can be.
Modules.specialAbilitiesStalkersOfDemonsDescript: You were taught to sense the weakness of demons using taboomagic. Ifyousuccessfullyattunetoademon, theGMwilltellyouits weakness, and how it may be destroyed. On a CRIT you may learn its true name. Which taboo must be broken?
Modules.specialAbilitiesTheyreWithUsDescription: You carry a symbol of your people / land; describe it and the grim bounding ritual. As long as you carry it, your Tribe gets +1d against Delving Too Deep and +1d resistance against creatures from the Burning Beyond or other spirits as well as against dread or despair. If you lose the symbol or it is destroyed, all get level 3 harm ’disheartened’. May only be healed by restoring the symbol somehow.
